B

Board - Class in src.logic
implements a game Board for battleships this includes, a field that stores the position of the users ships, a field that signifies where the opponent has already shot and a field that signifies where the user has already shot at
Board(int, int[]) - Constructor for class src.logic.Board
Initializes the variables the board needs
Bot - Class in src.coms
Bot is a subclass of NetworkPlayer that acts like a client object and also generates the responsible answers
Bot() - Constructor for class src.coms.Bot

convertShipArray(int[]) - Method in class src.gui.Gamescreen
Converts the passed ship-field format to ship-editing format --ships[0] = 2-sized-- --ships[1] = 3-sized-- --ships[2] = 4-sized-- --ships[3] = 5-sized-- e.g.: {5, 4, 4, 3, 3, 3, 2, 2, 2, 2} -> [4, 3, 2, 1]

save_game() - Method in class src.logic.Game
saves the Game by calling the Board objects save_game() method and sends save id to the network so the enemy also saves its own Game state

saves the game by writing the data of the Board object into a file that can later be used to restore the game state
save_opp_game(String) - Method in class src.logic.Game
identical to save_game, but this time the enemy wants to save the Game instead of the user

Handles communication and networking for multiplayer Battleship.
